trans-unit.source: When a configuration document is delivered to DSC, the document goes through various stages (pending, current, previous).
trans-unit.target: When a configuration document is delivered to DSC, the document goes through various stages (pending, current, previous).

trans-unit.source: We added a new cmdlet to DSC in Windows PowerShell 4.0, Remove-DscConfigurationDocument, as part of KB3000850.
trans-unit.target: We added a new cmdlet to DSC in Windows PowerShell 4.0, Remove-DscConfigurationDocument, as part of KB3000850.
